channel.title: keto on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in keto on Recipes

item.title: Marzipanh√∂rnchen (marzipan cookies)
item.description: Classic German almond cookie - a family favorite Prep Bake Serves 10 min 15-20 min 4-6 Ingredients 400 g marzipan dough (buy at Fred Meyer or homemade) 150 g powdered sugar 2 egg whites (ca. 50g) 70 g ground almonds 200 g sliced almonds 200 g tempered chocolade for glazing 20 ml Amaretto or Rum Steps Cut up the marzipan into small cubes With a kitchen mixer mix powdered sugar, ground almonds, amaretto and egg whites to a smooth (very sticky) dough Let rest in fridge for 15-30 min (easier to form the dough when chilled) Preheat oven to 350F (325 convection) Put the sliced almonds on a large plate with a rim (to roll the cookies in) Cut the dough into 40g portions and roll them on the almond filled plate into crecents (easier with slightly wet hands because of super sticky dough).

item.title: Mouse Au Chocolate
item.description: Super quick and sugar free chocolate mousse. Prep Chill Serves 10 min 30 min 4-6 Ingredients 1.5 cup heavy whipping cream 4 tbps heavy whipping cream 1/4 cup cocoa powder 25 g 100% cocoa baking chocolate 2 tbsp sweetener, I like purevia dark chocolate chunks, or dark baking chocolate in slivers for decoration Steps Whip heavy cream until fully thinkened and then add sweetener, vanilla and cocoa.
